title: Impulse - block slides on rough surface

content.question: A box of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> is sliding with constant speed <math alttext="v sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> on a horizontal surface, as shown. The block encounters a rough section where the coefficient of kinetic friction between the block and the surface is <math alttext="mu sub k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub></math>. After the block completely passes through the rough section, the speed of the block is <math alttext=" v sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>. Which of the following expressions is equal to the magnitude of the impulse delivered to the block when it is on the rough section?

choices.label: <math alttext="m times open parenthesis, v sub i, end sub, minus v sub f, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="m times open parenthesis, v sub i, end sub, minus v sub f, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>i</mi></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>v</mi><mi>f</mi></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
